name: ext-postgrest-crud
description: [![Stories in Ready](https://badge.waffle.io/timwis/ext-postgrest-crud.png?label=ready&title=Ready)](https://waffle.io/timwis/ext-postgrest-crud) # Ext.js CRUD An Ext.js-powered, spreadsheet-style Grid for Create/Read/Update/Delete against a postgres database with a [PostgREST API](https://github.com/begriffs/postgrest) in front of it
